help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster.

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="adminGroupObjectIds" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">

<prop type="array" name="initialAgentPoolConfigurations" required="True" identifiers="name">

<prop type="array" name="l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="labels">
<prop type="array<@KubernetesLabel_read>" name="taints">
<prop type="array<@L2NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_read>" name="l2Networks">
<prop type="array<@L3NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_read>" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array<@TrunkedNetworkAttachmentConfiguration_read>" name="trunkedNetworks">

<prop type="array" name="ipAddressPools" required="True">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster.

json.schema:
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="additionalInfo">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@ErrorDetail_read>" name="details" identifiers="message target">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@OperationStatusResult_read>" name="operations">

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster.
The extended location of the cluster associated with the resource.
The resource ID of the extended location on which the resource will be created.
The extended location type, for example, CustomLocation.
The geo-location where the resource lives

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.aadConfiguration.adminGroupObjectIds" options="admin-group-object-ids" required="True">
<arg type="array<@SshPublicKey_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.controlPlaneNodeConfiguration.administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="AdministratorConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.controlPlaneNodeConfiguration.availabilityZones" options="availability-zones">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations" options="initial-agent-pool-configurations" required="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array<@SshPublicKey_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys" options="ssh-public-keys" group="AdministratorConfiguration">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks" options="l2-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks" options="l3-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks" options="trunked-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].availabilityZones" options="availability-zones">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].labels" options="labels">
<arg type="array<@KubernetesLabel_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].taints" options="taints">
<arg type="array<@L2NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks" options="l2-networks">
<arg type="array<@L3NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks" options="l3-networks">
<arg type="array<@TrunkedNetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks" options="trunked-networks">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements" options="bgp-advertisements">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].communities" options="communities">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].ipAddressPools" options="ip-address-pools" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].peers" options="peers">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpPeers" options="bgp-peers">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools" options="ip-address-pools">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools[].addresses" options="addresses" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.l2ServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools" options="ip-address-pools">
<arg type="array" var="@IpAddressPool_create.addresses" options="addresses" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.podCidrs" options="pod-cidrs">
<arg type="array" var="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.serviceCidrs" options="service-cidrs">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="adminGroupObjectIds" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.aadConfiguration.adminGroupObjectIds" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array<@SshPublicKey_create>" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.controlPlaneNodeConfiguration.administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.controlPlaneNodeConfiguration.availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="initialAgentPoolConfigurations" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations" required="True" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array<@SshPublicKey_create>" name="sshPublicKeys" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].administratorConfiguration.sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="l2Networks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].availabilityZones">
<prop type="array" name="labels" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].labels">
<prop type="array<@KubernetesLabel_create>" name="taints" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.initialAgentPoolConfigurations[].taints">
<prop type="array<@L2NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" name="l2Networks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l2Networks">
<prop type="array<@L3NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" name="l3Networks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.l3Networks">
<prop type="array<@TrunkedNetworkAttachmentConfiguration_create>" name="trunkedNetworks" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.attachedNetworkConfiguration.trunkedNetworks">
<prop type="array" name="bgpAdvertisements" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements">
<prop type="array" name="communities" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].communities">
<prop type="array" name="ipAddressPools" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].ipAddressPools" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="peers" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpAdvertisements[].peers">
<prop type="array" name="bgpPeers" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.bgpPeers">
<prop type="array" name="ipAddressPools" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="addresses" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.bgpServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools[].addresses" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="ipAddressPools" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.l2ServiceLoadBalancerConfiguration.ipAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="addresses" arg="@IpAddressPool_create.addresses" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="podCidrs" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.podCidrs">
<prop type="array" name="serviceCidrs" arg="$kubernetesClusterParameters.properties.networkConfiguration.serviceCidrs">

<prop type="array" name="adminGroupObjectIds" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="attachedNetworkIds">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="availableUpgrades">
<prop type="array<@SshPublicKey_read>" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="availabilityZones">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="featureStatuses" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array" name="initialAgentPoolConfigurations" required="True" identifiers="name">
<prop type="array<@SshPublicKey_read>" name="sshPublicKeys">
<prop type="array" name="l2Networks">
<prop type="array" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array" name="trunkedNetworks">

<prop type="array<@L3NetworkAttachmentConfiguration_read>" name="l3Networks">
<prop type="array<@TrunkedNetworkAttachmentConfiguration_read>" name="trunkedNetworks">

<prop type="array" name="bgpPeers">
<prop type="array" name="ipAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="addresses" required="True">
<prop type="array<@IpAddressPool_read>" name="ipAddressPools">
<prop type="array" name="podCidrs">
<prop type="array" name="serviceCidrs">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="nodes" identifiers="name">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@KubernetesLabel_read>" name="labels" identifiers="key">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="networkAttachments" identifiers="networkAttachmentName">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array<@KubernetesLabel_read>" name="taints" identifiers="key">

help.short: The name of the Kubernetes cluster.
The Azure resource tags that will replace the existing ones.
The number of virtual machines that use this configuration.
The Kubernetes version for this cluster. Accepts n.n, n.n.n, and n.n.n-n format. The interpreted version used will be resolved into this field after creation or update.
